document_data.mainbody: Turan was one of the Blades of the Old Man as of . On the night of Tarsakh 25, they became aware of an intruder in Sentinelspire. While they were looking out for the intruder, they came across Lewan and Ulaan. On the orders of Weilus, they tried to get them to return to their room however, this led to a fight. Though at first he managed to hold Ulaan, she broke his hold and stabbed him by the time he got up, they became swarmed by killoren, which slew him.
